item.title: Jason add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "When you play a game of thrones you win or you die." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Jason add a quote by Robert Charles Wilson
item.description: "I won't put my ignorance on an altar and call it God. It feels like idolatry, like the worst kind of idolatry." -- Robert Charles Wilson

item.title: Jason add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "If you care about something you have to protect it – If you’re lucky enough to find a way of life you love, you have to find the courage to live it." -- John Irving

item.title: Jason add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Jason add a quote by Anton LaVey
item.description: "Stupidity—The top of the list for Satanic Sins. The Cardinal Sin of Satanism. It’s too bad that stupidity isn’t painful. Ignorance is one thing, but our society thrives increasingly on stupidity. It depends on people going along with whatever they are told. The media promotes a cultivated stupidity as a posture that is not only acceptable but laudable. Satanists must learn to see through the tricks and cannot afford to be stupid." -- Anton LaVey

item.title: Jason add a quote by Patrick Rothfuss
item.description: "You have to be a bit of a liar to tell a story the right way." -- Patrick Rothfuss

item.title: Jason add a quote by Patrick Rothfuss
item.description: "Just handle the books gently and you’ll get along fine." -- Patrick Rothfuss

item.title: Jason add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "For those who believe in God, most of the big questions are answered. But for those of us who can't readily accept the God formula, the big answers don't remain stone-written. We adjust to new conditions and discoveries. We are pliable. Love need not be a command nor faith a dictum. I am my own god. We are here to unlearn the teachings of the church, state, and our educational system. We are here to drink beer. We are here to kill war. We are here to laugh at the odds and live our lives so well that Death will tremble to take us." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Jason add a quote by Howard Phillips Lovecraft
item.description: "Almost nobody dances sober, unless they happen to be insane." -- Howard Phillips Lovecraft

item.title: Jason add a quote by H.P. Lovecraft
item.description: "The oldest and strongest emotion of mankind is fear, and the oldest and strongest kind of fear is fear of the unknown" -- H.P. Lovecraft

item.title: Jason add a quote by H. P. Lovercraft
item.description: "The most merciful thing in the world, I think, is the inability of the human mind to correlate all its contents. We live on a placid island of ignorance in the midst of black seas of the infinity, and it was not meant that we should voyage far." -- H. P. Lovercraft

item.title: Jason add a quote by H. P. Lovecraft
item.description: "I couldn't live a week without a private library - indeed, I'd part with all my furniture and squat and sleep on the floor before I'd let go of the 1500 or so books I possess." -- H. P. Lovecraft

item.title: Jason add a quote by H.P. Lovecraft
item.description: "Never Explain Anything" -- H.P. Lovecraft

item.title: Jason add a quote by H.P. Lovecraft
item.description: "Religion is still useful among the herd - that it helps their orderly conduct as nothing else could. The crude human animal is in-eradicably superstitious, and there is every biological reason why they should be. Take away his Christian god and saints, and he will worship something else..." -- H.P. Lovecraft

item.title: Jason add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Jason add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Jason add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "From childhood's hour I have not been. As others were, I have not seen. As others saw, I could not awaken. My heart to joy at the same tone. And all I loved, I loved alone." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Jason add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "There is no exquisite beauty… without some strangeness in the proportion." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Jason add a quote by Alexandre Dumas
item.description: "There is neither happiness nor misery in the world; there is only the comparison of one state with another, nothing more. He who has felt the deepest grief is best able to experience supreme happiness. We must have felt what it is to die, Morrel, that we may appreciate the enjoyments of life. " Live, then, and be happy, beloved children of my heart, and never forget, that until the day God will deign to reveal the future to man, all human wisdom is contained in these two words, 'Wait and Hope." -- Alexandre Dumas

item.title: Jason add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "I think that we're all mentally ill. Those of us outside the asylums only hide it a little better - and maybe not all that much better after all." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jason add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Nobody likes a clown at midnight" -- Stephen King

item.title: Jason add a quote by Caitlin R. Kiernan
item.description: "I need a world filled with wonder, with awe, with awful things. I couldn't exist in a world devoid of marvels, even if the marvels are terrible marvels. Even if they frighten me to consider them." -- Caitlin R. Kiernan

item.title: Jason add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "I am haunted by humans." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: Jason add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "I want to meet a guy named Art. I'd take him to a museum, hang him on the wall, criticize him, and leave." -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Jason add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "Writers fish for the right words like fishermen fish for, um, whatever those aquatic creatures with fins and gills are called. " -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Jason add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Jason add a quote by W.B. Yeats
Jason add a quote by Alexandar Tomov
item.description: "Strong belief in the bright future, always hiding fear of the past”." -- Alexandar Tomov
